response.original_title: LO QUE SE OCULTA EN LAS SOMBRAS
response.overview: During the Mexican Revolution, Reynaldo, a lonely antisocial  man who  lives isolated in the countryside, is tormented by a sinister creature that comes from  the darkest depths of the forest. Pursued by his own past, Reynaldo, accompanied by  Ram칩n, a young boy who is in his care, will confront the beast before it finishes  them off. However, a dark and cold secret hides in the origin of the creature, because  not everything is what it seems.

response.tagline: The true monsters live within us.
